---
title: "Sony"
description: "PTP Sony definitions"
---

# Sony

## AuthenticationFailed

**Code:** `0xa101`

Indicates that the major version of the connected host is less than that of the camera. It also indicates that authentication fails due to some other factor.

---

## PasswordLengthOverMax

**Code:** `0xa102`

Indicates that the password length is over max.

---

## PasswordIncludesInvalidCharacter

**Code:** `0xa103`

Indicates that the password includes invalid character.

---

## FeatureVersionInvalidValue

**Code:** `0xa104`

Indicates that the feature version is invalid value.

---

## TemporaryStorageFull

**Code:** `0xa105`

Indicates that the temporary storage is full.

---

## CameraStatusError

**Code:** `0xa106`

Indicates that a camera status error occurred.

---
